get.description: Retrieve paginated list of venues with filtering and sorting options. Users can only see venues from their accessible organizations.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in venue name, display name, and description

post.description: Create a new venue for the specified event day. User must have create permissions and access to the event's organization.

items.example: Bu etkinlik gününde aynı isimde bir mekan zaten var.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a venue including program sessions, statistics, and time conflicts

put.description: Update an existing venue with new data. If event_day_id is changed, user must have access to the target event day's organization.

403.description: Access denied to target event day

message.example: Hedef etkinlik gününe erişim yetkiniz yok.

delete.description: Delete a venue. Venue cannot be deleted if it has program sessions.

message.example: Oturum içeren mekan silinemez. Önce oturumları silin.

event_day_id.description: ID of the event day this venue belongs to

name.description: Venue name (must be unique within the event day)

display_name.description: Display name for the venue (defaults to name if not provided)

description.example: Large auditorium with theater seating and stage

color.description: Color code for venue display (hex format)
